Class AbstractView

  • java.lang.Object
    • player.AbstractView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer, View
    Direct Known Subclasses:

    public abstract class AbstractView
extends java.lang.Object
implements View, java.util.Observer
    abstract view class for the game. print() needs to be overriden

    Gil Mizrahi
